DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluates the effect of diabetic knowledge and self care behavior (DSME) alone or DSME plus motivational interviewing on glycemic control among children and adolescents with DM type 1. Half of participants will receive DSME along, while the other half will receive DSME plus MI.
DOC.brief_title: DSME or DSME + MI in T1DM on Glycemic Control
DOC.criteria: T1DM age more than 10 years old HbA1C more than 8% other types of DM receive medications that may effect blood glucose mental retardation
